messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] CA Charters, was New (somewhat ) to list / ISP's in CA
messages.msgSnippet: Here s a link that has a list of all the charters in CA http://www.cde.ca.gov/charter/ Because of the abuse of the charter system, you are now restricted to
messages.messageBody:
Here's a link that has a list of all the charters in CA
http://www.cde.ca.gov/charter/

Because of the abuse of the charter system, you are now restricted to using
one within a designated area from your home.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: "Carla" <wingingit@...>


> Hello, my name is Carla. I have been subscribed to this group for
> awhile, but nervous about posting. I am 35; have 3 kids (6,3 & 1).
> My oldest is now at the age that I have to decide on a charter
> school. For my husband's comfort level, I am going to try one out
> for this first year. Are there any Californians out there that can
> refer me to one? I really do not want one that imposes a curriculum
> on us.
